title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, goals, and requirements, including user stories, feature list, and technical specifications. Conduct market research, analyze competitors, and gather feedback from potential users (pet owners) to understand their needs and preferences.

title: Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the application structure, data models, and integration with third-party services.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store user profiles, pet information, social connections, and other data.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the server-side components, including APIs, business logic, and integration with the database and third-party services.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface and client-side components for the web and mobile applications.

title: AI Integration
description: Integrate AI models for pet diary generation and other AI-powered features.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures, data protection, and compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA).

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute various testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure quality and functionality.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure and deployment pipelines for staging and production environments, including continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD).

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user guides, API documentation, and support resources.
